name: regexpu
description: A source code transpiler that enables the use of ES6 Unicode regular expressions in ES5.

0.1.0.name: regexpu
0.1.0.description: A source code transpiler that enables the use of ES6 Unicode regular expressions in ES5.

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha tests/tests.js -- -u exports -R spec
